name: Crawl Out
description:
You will explore a dungeon that is separated into multiple different rooms by going through different doorways in a dungeon room each with its own twist. The only weapon you will be getting is a sword. Random items will spawn across the level which can be used to clear the dungeon.

This game is made by a group of students:

  • Yeng Zhou LinkedIn
  • Supendi LinkedIn
  • Farhan Almandho LinkedIn
  • Toh Hon Jun LinkedIn
  • Muhammad Danial Wahab LinkedIn
